name: Uno Toddler App
tagline: A fun bundle of toys for Toddlers~
body:
# Gameplay
Uno App is a toy bundle aimed at toddlers with the convenience of being mobile. There will be four different game modes that will challenge a toddlers sense of color, spatial reasoning, and will help learn different animals.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
